steps.description: a-synuclein inhibits PLD2, and the study links this to pathogenicity.
In vitro experiments measure PLD2 inhibition, relevant to the disease mechanism.
Wild-type and mutant proteins used as controls, with 3 total controls (a, b, g).
No direct OddsPath values, but 3 controls <11, leading to PS3_moderate.
Mutant A30P shows enhanced PLD2 inhibition compared to wild-type.
